mapper.select: select store_number, store_title, store_content, store_date, store_price, store_view_cnt, h.hashtag_number, m.member_number, m.member_nickname from tbl_member m join tbl_store s on m.member_number = s.member_number join tbl_hashtag h on s.hashtag_number = h.hashtag_number order by store_number desc limit #{startRow}, #{rowCount}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_store(store_title, store_content, store_date, store_price, store_view_cnt, hashtag_number, member_number) values(#{storeTitle}, #{storeContent}, #{storeDate}, #{storePrice}, #{storeViewCnt}, #{hashtagNumber}, #{memberNumber})
mapper.select: select store_number, store_title, store_content, store_date, store_price, store_view_cnt, hashtag_number, member_number)
